newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Piltel signs MOU for telecoms in Mindanao.
newsitem.headline: Piltel signs MOU for telecoms in Mindanao.

text.p: Pilipino Telephone Corp (Piltel) said on Thursday it signed a memorandum of understanding and alliance with two local companies to develop telecommunications services in the Mindanao region of the southern Philippines.
In a disclosure to the Philippine Stock Exchange, Piltel said it signed the MOU on Wednesday with Philippine Global Communications (Philcom) and Major Telecoms Inc (MTI).
No other details of the MOU were announced.

Philcom is an international gateway facility operator which is mandated to put up 300,000 lines in exchange for its permit. Major Telecoms is a subsidiary of Philcom which will undertake the installation of lines.
Both Piltel and Philcom were awarded contracts to set up telecommunications facilities in separate service areas in Mindanao.
